resources.string: On your device the GPS functionality is disabled in the Energy Safer mode as soon as your display turns off. This interrupts the tracking.\n\nFor this reason we ask you to disable the Energy Safer Mode during tracking. We do our best to keep the energy consumption as low as possible.

The Background processing is restricted for this app. Because of this the tracking stops when the display is turned off or when the app is minimized.

Please disable this restriction for this app:
`Open Settings` Button > Advanced > Battery > Background restriction > Remove
The tracking is based on GPS position data. This feature is currently disabled on your device.\n\nPlease enable the location service (GPS) in the system settings.

On your device manufacturer specific settings may be enabled by default which stop the background tracking after a short time. 

Please whitelist this app in the battery settings of your mobile phone. 

Attention: Some manufacturers reset these settings on OS updates
Huawei devices do not allow apps to run background tracking by default. \n\nPlease set app settings \> Battery \> App launch to Manage manually and enable all options.
Huawei devices do not allow apps to run background tracking by default. \n\nPlease go to Phone Settings \> Advanced Settings \> Battery manager \> Protected apps and set our app as protected app.

Your Samsung device contains a "Smart Manager" which needs to be set up correctly to for the background tracking to work with a turned off display. \n\n Please go to your phone settings \> Smart Manager \> Battery \> App power saving \> Details > Choose our app > set to Turn off.

Your Samsung device contains a "device care" setting which needs to be set up correctly to for the background tracking to work with a turned off display. 

First try to find Device maintenance/care \> Battery and add our app to the unmonitored apps. 

If this does not work or if you cannot find this setting, this should help: 
Go to your phone settings \> Device maintenance/care \> Battery \> Tab on the 3-dot menu and on Settings \> Disable all setting but notifications. Then go to Sleeping apps and make sure our app is not listed.

On Sony devices there is a manufacturer specific energy safer mode called STAMINA. In this mode the background tracking is stopped automatically by the system. \n\nIf you have problems with the tracking functionality please disable STAMINA completely.

Xiaomi devices only allow background tracking when the display is disabled with the correct settings. 

Please set Settings - Battery + Performance - Manage Apps Battery Usage - choose our App - Energy Safer mode to "No Restrictions" 

and set Settings - Battery - Other permissions - "Start in Background" to "allowed".

Xiaomi devices only allow background tracking when the display is disabled with the correct settings. \n\nPlease set Settings - Permissions - Autostart - choose our App - "Allow apps to start automatically" to "allowed".

We do not know of any manufacturer specific settings von your device which could prevent the tracking function from working. 

If the tracking stops anyways this could be due to an "optimization app", which stops our background service during a trip / when the display is turned off. 

In case you need help do not hesitate to drop us a line by e-mail. Use the Help button below.
